name: Xfinity
description: Xfinity, a brand of Comcast, offers high-speed internet services with options for advanced WiFi equipment and unlimited data plans, including mobile services for post-pay internet customers.
emergency_steps:
- Check your router's status lights to ensure it is powered on and connected properly.  
- Use your mobile device to visit Xfinity's outage map to check for local outages.  
- If there is no outage reported, restart your router by unplugging it for 30 seconds and then plugging it back in.  
- Contact Xfinity support through their website or mobile app for assistance.  
- Utilize mobile data for essential internet needs until service is restored.

Non-Emergency Tips:  
- Sign up for Xfinity alerts via the My Account app to receive updates on service status and outages.  
- Take advantage of Xfinity's 5-Year Price Guarantee for long-term savings on your internet plan.  
- Explore Xfinity Mobile options if you are an Xfinity Internet post-pay customer.
